Je suis Corrinda Gablechuck, en direct de l'arrêt d'autobus, où il semble que Shuckton au grand complet attend l'arrivée du procureur de la grande ville qui essaiera de faire condamner notre meurtrier local, Crim Hollingsworth.

Corrinda: ...I'm here at the bus depot where it seems like all of Shuckton is waiting for the arrival of the big city prosecutor who will try to convict our own homegrown murderer, Crim Hollingsworth.

and I have a decision, a life-altering one that I have to make and, um, so should I keep this baby or not?
